Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/67th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line  trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line  trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
